pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

supported_languages:
